Bangalore Chess Club Meet-up

8th May 2022 | 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM

Event Details

Register here:

https://insider.in/chess-club-meet-up-may8-2022/event

Terms & Conditions

By participating in this event, you agree to the following terms:

  • Tickets: All tickets are non-refundable. Late arrivals may miss rounds, so please arrive at least 15 minutes early for check-in.
  • Venue Rules: Participants must follow venue policies on decorum and safety. The organizer is not responsible for lost or misplaced belongings.
  • Photography & Media: By attending, you consent to photos and videos taken during the event being used for promotional purposes by the organizer.

Contact Us: bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com | @bangalorechessclub

Event Location

Lahe Lahe
Indiranagar, Bengaluru, India

Address

Bangalore, India bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com

Info

Bangalore Chess Club is the largest offline Chess Community in India where we aim to promote chess as a non competitive sport across ages and skill levels. Always striving to make chess fun.
